Name: MiniGolf
About the game: Take a swing at this amazing mini-golf game! Enjoy the realistic gameplay with more than 50 fields to play. Your time on these 3-D greens will amaze you as you play through phenomenal obstacles and unique locations, like a castle, a circus, a factory, and more. Can you come in under par? - Advanced physics engine - 6 different campaigns - 50 fields to play - Stylish graphics
